Home.title: WORD HUNT: A MIND GYMNASTICS GAME.
Home.description: Word Hunt is a great way to test your mental skills and improve your vocabulary! This addictive game features hundreds of word puzzles at different difficulty levels. Test your speed and word knowledge, learn new words, and have fun while doing mental gymnastics!
Home.content: Enter your username and start the game.

Game.title: WORD PUZZLES GAME
Game.description: Please enter the word you think matches the hint given below. Use the input field to submit your answer. Good luck and have fun!
